name: Euro Truck Simulator 2
notes:
Installer needs bash,  wget, awk and md5sum.
To launch the mod you need to launch steam first through 'Run EXE inside wine prefix' (default location is "$HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix/drive_c/Program Files/Steam/Steam.exe")
content:
files:
- steamdata: $WINESTEAM:227300:/
- launcher: https://github.com/lhark/truckersmp-cli/raw/master/truckersmp-cli.exe
- downloader: https://notabug.org/soredake/lutris-additions/raw/master/truckers-mp.sh
game:
  arch: win64
  args: . $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/truckersmp
  exe: $GAMEDIR/truckersmp-cli.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $steamdata
installer:
- chmodx: downloader
- execute:
    file: downloader
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $launcher
require-binaries: bash, wget, awk, md5sum
